name: The Global Instructor Network
tag_list: teachers, instructors, tutors, forum, social-networking, promoting-the-individual
overview:
The Global Instructor and Private Lessons Network (www.globalinstructor.com), is positioning itself to be the worldâ€™s leading online freelance service, exclusively for Freelance Instructors, Tutors, and Teachers.

“We have launched a robust and interactive web based community, catering to the promotion of the individual rather than businesses”

“The Global Instructor and Private Lessons Network is intended to change the way Freelance Instructors, Teachers and Tutors, promote themselves individually, by providing them an efficient and cost-effective way to provide exposure for themselves and have access to potential students. Focus is on in-house council and/or private lessons, bringing the Social Networking Society as we now know it, back to the Human Interaction we have lost in the recent decade.â€

The Global Instructor and Private Lesson Network is a place any freelance instructor or teacher around the world can list their services and specialties, so the likelihood of them being found by potential students in their area is greater. Period. Just think of it as a newspaper ad, or your own personal advertising agency… But the rates are great! And the exposure is Phenomenal. We have the search engines crawling our pages every few days and as the site grows in popularity and membership, the comparable probability of the Member of our Network being the most Organic and Relevant Search Goes to 100%. What this means to you is your profile will be indexed, then as someone searches for “Guitar teachers in Las Vegas”, or “a Math Tutor in New Guinea”, they will not get this site.. per se.. They Get our Members Site Profile. Right from Google. If they get this site because of our SEO Mastery.. They still get our Member.

funding_rounds.source_description: The Beta-Release of The Global Instructor and Private Lesson Network!
